article:
'David H. Grinspoon' is an American astrobiologist. He is the current curator of
Astrobiology at the Denver Museum of Nature and Science. and was
appointed Baruch S. Blumberg NASA-Library of Congress Chair in Astrobiology for
2012/2013. http://www.loc.gov/today/pr/2012/12-080.html

He has published two books, Venus Revealed and Lonely Planets: The Natural
Philosophy of Alien Life, the latter of which won the 2004 PEN literary award
for nonfiction  He is an adjunct professor of Astrophysical and
Planetary Science at the University of Colorado.
